item.title: Playername+
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I believe it has to have a plus either side. Like this.

" + playerName + "

So like in this context. For example.

sendFrame126("Welcome to your bank, " + playerName + " ", 7421);

Read full topic

item.title: Playername+
item.dc:creator: @IceKo IceKo
item.description:
@IceKo wrote:

I see in peoples code they use ‘playername+’ so I tryed to use it in a server message ( The message you get when you log in EG ‘Welcome to EGScape!’ ) and it didnt work - Here is my code } if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 3753 && q8 != 15){ playerEquipment[playerHat] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 0; setEquipment(-1, 0,playerHat); } if(inPcGame()){ toX = 2657; toY = 2639; } getTotalLevel(); specAttack(); l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499); sM("[SERVER]Log in successfull, welcome 'playername+'"); sM("[SERVER]New command ::home");
Im not sure if it is all part of the [SERVER] bit (lol im new :D) but yeah theres my code, anyone help me get the ‘playername+’ to say the players name please?

Read full topic
